array.string: Remind myself that I love yoga because of the solitude.
Remember that I love spending time with my partner because we make each other laugh.
Prioritize exercise by putting it in my calendar.
Prioritize meditation in the morning by making it the very first thing I do when I wake up.
Give thanks for my family. Acknowledge the gifts and blessings by saying a silent prayer during dinner
Call Shelly and tell her that I appreciate talking to her about my career.
Do one act of kindness while engaged in study group by bringing everyone donuts and coffee.
Pay for the drink of the person in line behind me at the coffee shop.
Bring more laughter to family time by teaching my kids a few jokes.
Get more creative at work by asking Laura if I can join the creative breakthrough meetings.
Remind myself that I love yoga because of the solitude.
Remember that I love spending time with Alex because she makes me laugh.
Prioritize exercise by putting it in my calendar.
Prioritize meditation in the morning by making it the very first thing I do when I wake up.
Give thanks for the aspects of chores I‚Äôm grateful for. Acknowledge the gifts and blessings.
Thank Clara for collaborating on the work project with me. I love teamwork, and I think we have been a great team.
Bring more personal growth to the ‚Äúmeh‚Äù feeling parts of driving by: listening to podcasts or audio books.
When doing homework I can pair up with another student so that I can honor my values of teamwork, camaraderie and collaboration.
What I need to feel better about Work that‚Äôs in my control is: Eat lunch away from my desk. To meet this need, I will take this action step: Ask Mary to join me for lunch outside.
I need to feel engaged, supported and harmonious in my relationship. I am going to look for new communication models so that we can keep our spirited debates friendly.
Bring personal growth to driving by listening to podcasts or audiobooks.
Bring freedom to exercise by taking hikes vs going to the gym.
Shift my thoughts about attending graduate school by focusing on the need(s) it fulfills: career, personal growth.
Shift my thinking about going to Mark‚Äôs social gathering and focus on the needs it fulfills: supporting my spouse.

What I need to feel better about time with friends that‚Äôs in my control is this: More adventure. To get this need met, I will take this action step: Ask some of my friends to join me in climbing Mt. Whitney.
I need to feel like I‚Äôm impacting the world. I don‚Äôt see how I can achieve this at my job right now, so I‚Äôll volunteer at a non-profit a few days a week after work.
Reduce the amount of time I spend with my cousin by doing this: telling her that I have a tight schedule and will reach out when I have more time.
Reduce stressful holiday time with family by booking a shorter trip and spending the rest of the holidays with friends.
Replace watching TV with this better-feeling activity: reading a book.
Instead of watching all of the kid‚Äôs soccer practice, I am going to go next door to the coffee shop and answer emails for part of it.
Bring exercise to Work by: challenging myself to walk the stairs instead of taking the elevator.
Bring fun to Chores by blasting music and singing while I clean.
Shift my thoughts about Work by focusing on the needs it fulfills: financial stability, creativity, achievement.
When I drive to work tomorrow, remind myself that even though my job is boring, it meets my need to make money.
What I need to feel better about Traveling that‚Äôs in my control is: More excitement. To get this need met, I will take this action step: I will try activities I‚Äôve never tried before.
My relationship with my significant other feels stagnant and I need more adventure. I will book a trip to go zip-lining together.
Reduce the amount of time I spend on Housework by doing this feel-good activity instead: engaging my kids to help me while dancing to great music.
Spend less time on Social Media at bed time by going to sleep one hour earlier and getting more sleep.
Move towards replacing bartending job by taking an online class about entrepreneurship.¬†
Replace social media consumption with taking photographs.
